channel.title: Comments on: This Post Brought To You By Mahalo

item.title: By: Mark Nolan
item.dc:creator: Mark Nolan
item.description:
Hey that beach towel you got is some awesome Mahalo swag, way to go dude.
That's a good way to get free advertising for a website, give away cool stuff with the name on it.
Mark
item.content:encoded:
Hey that beach towel you got is some awesome Mahalo swag, way to go dude.

That’s a good way to get free advertising for a website, give away cool stuff with the name on it.

Mark

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Good catch! I fixed it now. Thanks Randy.
item.content:encoded: Good catch! I fixed it now. Thanks Randy.

item.title: By: randy
item.dc:creator: randy
item.description: I think that you got a hat not a hate. :) Mahalo!
item.content:encoded: I think that you got a hat not a hate. Mahalo!

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Jason sent out a Tweet saying the first 50 people to e-mail their address would get a Mahalo prize pack. I think they were all gone 5 minutes later because he has such a ravenous following. You gotta keep your eyes peeled for this stuff.
item.content:encoded: Jason sent out a Tweet saying the first 50 people to e-mail their address would get a Mahalo prize pack. I think they were all gone 5 minutes later because he has such a ravenous following. You gotta keep your eyes peeled for this stuff.

item.title: By: John Hays
item.dc:creator: John Hays
item.description: Yeah but what draw? What did you do to be considered?
item.content:encoded: Yeah but what draw? What did you do to be considered?

item.title: By: jpspiderman(JP Adams)
item.dc:creator: jpspiderman(JP Adams)
item.description: Maybe it's just me but It's like 100degrees in jersey for like three days now I need free swag!!!
item.content:encoded: Maybe it’s just me but It’s like 100degrees in jersey for like three days now I need free swag!!!

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: Luck of the draw I guess.

item.title: By: John Hays
item.dc:creator: John Hays
item.description: How'd you get the beach towel? That's sweet!!
item.content:encoded: How’d you get the beach towel? That’s sweet!!

item.title: By: skyvan
item.dc:creator: skyvan
item.description: Vic, why complain when you actually get something, i didnt get any free swag and I'm not complaining, btw that is some awesome beach gear you got there Russ.
item.content:encoded: Vic, why complain when you actually get something, i didnt get any free swag and I’m not complaining, btw that is some awesome beach gear you got there Russ.

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: I was hoping for a snazzy mug but beggars can't be choosers I guess.
item.content:encoded: I was hoping for a snazzy mug but beggars can’t be choosers I guess.
